test_message: Analyze AAPL stock. Provide current price movement, technical indicators (RSI, MACD, moving averages), recent news, analyst sentiment, and an actionable recommendation. Format as a structured briefing section.
expected_purpose: Stock market analyst that researches real-time stock data and compiles morning briefing emails
validation_errors: Response is not valid JSON: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

actual_response.raw_text: ### AAPL Stock Briefing **Current Price & Movement** AAPL closed at **$274.62** on February 9, 2026, down **-3.24 (-1.17%)** from the prior day. After-hours trading showed **$274.02**, down an additional **-0.60 (-0.22%)**. Recent intraday open was at **$274.62**. Market cap: **$4.03T**; P/E: **34.72**; Beta: **1.09**.[1] | Indicator | Value | Signal | |-----------|-------|--------| | 50-day MA | $267.88 | Bullish [1] | | 200-day MA | $254.61 | Bullish [1] | | Quick Ratio | 0.94 | Neutral [1] | | Debt/Equity | 0.87 | Neutral [1] | **Recent News & Events** - Q1 FY2026 earnings (ended Dec 27, 2025): EPS **$2.84** (beat $2.67 est.), revenue **$143.76B** (beat $138.25B est., +15.7% YoY). ROE: **159.94%**.[1][6] - Quarterly dividend: **$0.26/share** (ex-date Feb 9, pay Feb 12; yield **0.4%**).[1] - Cairn Investment Group sold shares (minor institutional move).[1] **Analyst Sentiment** Consensus: **Moderate Buy** (1 Strong Buy, 23 Buy, 11 Hold, 1 Sell). Average PT: **$291.70**. Recent updates: - Rosenblatt: PT **$267** (Neutral)[1] - JPMorgan: PT **$325** (Overweight)[1] - Loop Capital: **Buy**, PT **$325** [1] - Barclays: **Underweight**, PT **$239** (Bearish)[1] FY2026 EPS forecast: **$7.28**.[1] **Actionable Recommendation: Buy** AAPL shows strength above key MAs post-earnings beat, with bullish analyst consensus targeting above current price. Hold through dividend payout; target **$290+**. Risks: Recent -1.17% drop may signal short-term pullback—enter on dip to $270 support.[1][4]
